item.title: hugo + github
item.description: brew install hugo # Github repository 2개 생성 (blog, {username}.github.io) # 프로젝트 생성 hugo new site blog git init # themes(https://themes.gohugo.io/) # theme 경로 themes/theme 이름 git submodule add https://github.com/st-wong/hugo-spectre-pixel-theme.git themes/spectre-pixel # config 복사 cp blog/themes/spectre-pixel/exampleSite/config.toml blog/config.toml # config.toml 수정 # baseurl = "https://<username>.github.io/" # 서버 실행 (localhost:1313) hugo server # 배포 # blog/deploy.sh 루트 디렉토리에 생성 deploy.sh #!/bin/bash echo -e "\033[0;32mDeploying updates to GitHub...\033[0m" # Build the project. # hugo -t 테마명 hugo -t spectre-pixel # Go To Public folder, sub module commit cd public # Add changes to git.
